Steps.StepString: Crafted a script to steal the user's cookies and send them to an external server
Injected malicious script into the contact form and submitted it
When application displayed the message containing the malicious script, it executed it in the user's browser, allowing me to steal their cookies
With the user's session, I was able to perform various actions on their behalf
Recommended that the application implement proper input validation and sanitization techniques to prevent XSS attacks
